spec_data.Name: libreoffice-ogltrans
spec_data.License: (MPLv1.1 or LGPLv3+) and LGPLv3 and LGPLv2+ and BSD and (MPLv1.1 or GPLv2 or LGPLv2 or Netscape) and Public Domain and ASL 2.0 and MPLv2.0 and CC0
spec_data.Description:
OpenGL Transitions enable 3D slide transitions to be used in LibreOffice.
Requires good quality 3D support for your graphics card for best experience.
